mapper.update: update difficulty set CORE_ID = #{coreId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `NAME` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `STATUS` = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TENANT_ID = #{tenantId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_USER_ID = #{updateUserId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_USER_ID = #{createUserId,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, CORE_ID, `NAME`, `STATUS`, SEQ, TENANT_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID from difficulty where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
select ID, CORE_ID, `NAME`, `STATUS`, SEQ, TENANT_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER_ID, CREATE_USER_ID from difficulty
